title: Transfer to NA 2 days wait
body:
i got 2 oce accounts so i though i'd transfer one to play with some friends in na
transfer from oce to na, i did it thursday still no go
i try to login and it says your account has tranfered to another server
it says that on both servers and it is still on my friends list on my other oce account i put in a support ticket at around 9am saturday morning no reply yet
any idea what the issue is ohh also i can't log into that accounts webpage on any server  with the password combo
i thought maybe it is a change off account name because i think i did that
but i put in the email to send me the account name and nothing for 2 days with that i guess i wait on the support

replies.body: What server is your patcher set to? OCE or NA?
i've tried both i ended up trying every server for league and nothing, i think support will fix it up just annoying it is taking a while

It might be that the cache for holding the "your account has been transferred" message has incorrectly been set to activate upon any login request. Could you get a friend or someone to try and log into your client and see if it lets them?
